text: Emperor of the North Pole is a 1973 American adventure drama movie directed by Robert Aldrich and stars Lee Marvin, Ernest Borgnine, Keith Carradine, Simon Oakland, Charles Tyner, Harry Caesar. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 adventure movies Category:1973 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich
title: Emperor of the North Pole
